alert.note: Alert for Northern Rosebud; Powder River; Southern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Powder River and southern Rosebud Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 642 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ashland, or 28 miles southeast of Colstrip, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail with heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ashland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Motorists on US-212 should prepare for rapidly changing conditions. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
